## EditOpInfo type

`EditOpInfo` represents the information of the edit operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EditOpInfo = {
    type: 'edit';
    from: number;
    to: number;
    path: string;
    value: {
        attributes: Indexable;
        content: string;
    };
};
```
<b>References:</b> [Indexable](./yorkie-js-sdk.indexable.md)
